description:
Remaining useful Life (RuL) describes the approximated life of a part, a component, an assembly, a vehicle. 
The approximation is based on the damage due to usage and extrapolation. 
remainingUsefulLife can be a procentual number, or expressed in remainingDistance or remaingOperationHours or remainingAge.

urn_samm_io.catenax.rul_1.0.0_Timestamp.description: Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.

urn_samm_io.catenax.rul_1.0.0_OperatingH.description: Operating hours for the vehicle respectively part.

urn_samm_io.catenax.rul_1.0.0_StatusChar.description: Status describes the date when this aspect is filled, the according mileage and according operating hours.

mileage.description: Mileage of the vehicle respectively part at date of determination.

urn_samm_io.catenax.rul_1.0.0_Informatio.description: Origin of input load spectrum: measured, simulated, aggregated

urn_samm_io.catenax.rul_1.0.0_LoaddataSo.description: Information on the origin of the used load spectrum. If available, the link to the load spectrum.

informationOriginLoadSpectrum.description: A load spectrum is used to calulated the damage and the expected remaining useful for similar further usage. Information on the source of the load spectrum is stored.

sourceLoadSpectrum.description: The link to the load spectrum used to determine the remaining useful life, if available.

remainingRunningDistance.description: Expected additional mileage for the vehicle or part might without failure.

remainingOperatingHours.description: Expected additional operation hours for the vehicle or part might without failure.

determinationStatus.description: Remaining useful life is determined at a specific  date with  acording mileage and operating hours. This status should be stored to interpretate the calculated values remaingRunningDistance and RemainingOperatingHours.

determinationLoaddataSource.description: The source of the load data used to determine the remaining useful life is stored for information/interpretation.
